Non-Profit Organization Dove

A non-profit organzation that works to take action together to boost self-esteem and advice the norm on social media. They want to help young people detoxify their feeds, so they can redefine beauty. The article linked talks about the cost of toxic beauty standards.

Non-Profit Organization Galia Collaborative

This is a non-profit organization that empowers the mental health in women by developing their mental strength and well-being. They state that “When women repurpose their power in pursuit of their dreams, we’re unstoppable.” The article linked talks about a memeber of the Galia team's experience of body image and encourage us to love the way we look.

Non-Profit Organization The Body-Positive Organization

This is a non-profit organization that educates a lot of people around the world because of their physical appearance through a lot of programs and community services. They help people resist negative attitudes towards themselves. The page linked talks about the 5 Competencies of the Be Body Positive Model that will can help you to cope with this issue.

Non-Profit Organization National Eating Disorder Association

This is a non-profit organization supports the individuals and families that are affected by eating disorders and that they also provide tips for people who are currently suffering in treatment and being able to have quality care. The page linked talks about the Body Positive project that the organzation created and the preventation that be done on problem like disorder eating, a danger that toxic beauty standards can bring.

Government Agency NYS - Office of Mental Health

This is a governmental agency that provides mental health services for people that are suffering from mental health issues. They oversee more than 4,500 programs and that they serve more 900,000 individuals each year. The page linked allow you the access the services you need.
